headline.main: State Department Upgrades Network Security Against Cyber Attacks
headline.print_headline: State Department Upgrades Network Security Against Cyber Attacks

docs.snippet: The State Department on Friday said it was upgrading the security of its unclassified computer network to defend against cyber attacks, leaving some employees unable to send outside emails or access the internet....
docs.lead_paragraph: The State Department on Friday said it was upgrading the security of its unclassified computer network to defend against cyber attacks, leaving some employees unable to send outside emails or access the internet.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before he decided he wanted to become Chicago's mayor, Jesus Garcia was best known as a mild-mannered activist and legislator who dropped by businesses in his Mexican-American neighborhood to talk to people about their problems and how he could help.

headline.main: Brewers Say Dontrelle Willis Ends Comeback Bid, Will Retire

headline.print_headline: 5 Things to Know About Southern California's Heat Wave

docs.lead_paragraph: While parts of the country are still feeling winter's chill, Southern California is headed into an overheated weekend with record-breaking temperatures that suggest next week's arrival of spring may be a footnote in a region already looking at summer.

headline.main: Human Rights Concerns Limit U.S. Intelligence, Military Aid to Nigeria

headline.main: Strike at Marathon's Galveston Bay Plant to Continue: USW Official
headline.print_headline: Strike at Marathon's Galveston Bay Plant to Continue: USW Official

docs.snippet: A strike by the United Steelworkers (USW) local union at the   Marathon Petroleum Corp Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City, Texas, will continue as long as the company refuses to accept the terms of a newly-negotiated national agreement without e...
docs.lead_paragraph: A strike by the United Steelworkers (USW) local union at the   Marathon Petroleum Corp Galveston Bay Refinery in Texas City, Texas, will continue as long as the company refuses to accept the terms of a newly-negotiated national agreement without encumberances, said a union official on Friday.
